#define TIMING_MEAN

Functions

void sim (const PARMS_T *parms, POWFS_T *powfs, APER_T *aper, RECON_T *recon)
 Closed loop simulation main loop.

Detailed Description

Call various functions to do the simulation and evaluate performance.

Function Documentation

void sim ( const PARMS_T *  parms,
POWFS_T *  powfs,
APER_T *  aper,
RECON_T *  recon 
)

Closed loop simulation main loop.

It calls init_simu() to initialize the simulation struct. Then calls genscreen() to generate atmospheric turbulence screens. Then for every time step, it calls perfevl() to evaluate performance, wfsgrad() to do wfs measurement, tomofit() to do tomography and DM fit, filter() to do DM command filtering. In MOAO mode, it call calls moao_recon() for MOAO DM fitting. 

00051                                    {
00052     int simend=parms->sim.end;
00053     int simstart=parms->sim.start;
00054     if(parms->sim.skysim){
00055     save_skyc(powfs,recon,parms);
00056     }
00057     if(simstart>=simend) return;
00058     double tk_0=myclockd();
00059 
00060     for(int iseed=0; iseed<parms->sim.nseed; iseed++){
00061     double tk_1=myclockd();
00062     SIM_T *simu=init_simu(parms,powfs,aper,recon,iseed);
00063     if(!simu) continue;//skip.
00064     if(parms->sim.frozenflow){
00065         /*Generating atmospheric screen(s) that frozen flows.*/
00066         genscreen(simu);
00067     }
00068     double tk_2=myclockd();
00069     const int CL=parms->sim.closeloop;
00070     for(int isim=simstart; isim<simend; isim++){
00071         read_self_cpu();//initialize CPU usage counter
00072         simu->isim=isim;
00073         simu->status->isim=isim;
00074         sim_update_etf(simu);
00075         double ck_0=myclockd();
00076         if(!parms->sim.frozenflow){
00077         //re-seed the atmosphere in case atm is loaded from shm
00078         seed_rand(&simu->atm_rand, lrand(&simu->init));
00079         disable_atm_shm=1;
00080         genscreen(simu);
00081         dcellfree(simu->opdr); 
00082         dcellfree(simu->dmfit_hi);
00083         dcellfree(simu->dmreal);
00084         }
00085         if(CL){//before wfsgrad so we can apply ideal NGS modes
00086         perfevl(simu);
00087         }
00088         double ck_1=myclockd(); double cpu_1=read_self_cpu();
00089         wfsgrad(simu);
00090         double ck_2=myclockd(); double cpu_2=read_self_cpu();
00091         tomofit(simu);
00092         double ck_3=myclockd(); double cpu_3=read_self_cpu();
00093         filter(simu);//updates dmreal.
00094         if(recon->moao)
00095         moao_recon(simu);
00096         double ck_4=myclockd(); double cpu_4=read_self_cpu();
00097         if(!CL){//Only in Open loop
00098         perfevl(simu);
00099         }
00100         save_simu(simu);
00101         double ck_5=myclockd();
00102         long steps_done=iseed*(simend-simstart)+(isim+1-simstart);
00103         long steps_rest=parms->sim.nseed*(simend-simstart)-steps_done;
00104         simu->status->rest=(long)((ck_5-tk_0-(tk_2-tk_1)*(iseed+1))/steps_done*steps_rest
00105                       +(tk_2-tk_1)*(parms->sim.nseed-iseed-1));
00106         simu->status->laps=(long)(ck_5-tk_0);
00107 #if TIMING_MEAN == 1
00108         if(isim>simstart+2){
00109         /*
00110           skip first three time steps that 
00111           are not representative 
00112           due to missing DM commands
00113         */
00114         simu->status->wfs  +=(double)(ck_2-ck_1);
00115         simu->status->recon+=(double)(ck_3-ck_2);
00116         simu->status->cache+=(double)(ck_4-ck_3);
00117         simu->status->eval +=(double)(ck_1-ck_0+ck_5-ck_4);
00118         simu->status->tot  +=(double)(ck_5-ck_0);
00119         simu->status->scale=1./(double)(isim-simstart-2);
00120         }
00121 #else
00122         simu->status->wfs  =(double)(ck_2-ck_1);
00123         simu->status->recon=(double)(ck_3-ck_2);
00124         simu->status->cache=(double)(ck_4-ck_3);
00125         simu->status->eval =(double)(ck_1-ck_0+ck_5-ck_4);
00126         simu->status->tot  =(double)(ck_5-ck_0);
00127         simu->status->scale=1;
00128 #endif
00129         int this_time=myclocki();
00130         if(this_time>simu->last_report_time+1){
00131         //we don't print out or report too frequency.
00132         simu->last_report_time=this_time;
00133         scheduler_report(simu->status);
00134         }
00135         print_progress(simu);
00136         if(simu->nthread>1){
00137         info2("CPU Usage: WFS:%.2f Recon:%.2f CACHE:%.2f EVAL:%.2f Mean:%.2f\n",
00138               cpu_2, cpu_3, cpu_4, cpu_1, (cpu_1+cpu_2+cpu_3+cpu_4)*0.25);
00139         }
00140     }//isim
00141     free_simu(simu);
00142     }
00143 }
